text: Triumph & Tragedy is Grade's first release on Victory Records. "Panama" is a cover of a Van Halen song. This EP was included in its entirety on The Embarrassing Beginning. ==Track listing== # "Triumph & Tragedy" # "Stolen Bikes Ride Faster" # "Panama" ==References== * Category:1999 EPs Category:Victory Records EPs Category:Grade (band) albums
title: Triumph & Tragedy
